data.message:
Well I had to say goodbye to my favorite sports team now I've got to say goodbye to my favorite rapper.
you drew the line! 
I choose United States of America not a man that I already know with a drug addicts loves violence and wraps around it to make his career but turns it around for political b******* for all of us to sit here listening here you've gotten soft you're up over 40 on siding with Kid Rock and I stand for the majority

replies.message: You're not even old enough to vote kid nobody gives a damn
